defs: = ಚುಂಚುಪತ್ರ.
a kind of plant .
a kind of military weapon.
that part of the roof of a building, projecting beyond the wall, sloping outward; the roof-ledge.
(dial.) a man with short hair.
a small well or reservoir.
the plant Solanum ferox of Solanaceae family; Indian night-shade.
its fruit.
a woman who procures men for a prostitute.
to be in a horizontal, recumbent or prostrate position, as on a bed or the ground; to recline; to lie.
to engage in sexual intercourse; to copulate.
a man who kisses or is kissing.
a man given to excessive sexual indulgence; a lascivious or licentious man; a lecher.
a man who attracts, fascinates others with a view to cheating; a cheat.
a material that has the property of attracting iron pieces towards; a magnet.
the wind that has the power to charm, as the cool, gentle breeze.
the power or quality of attracting, charming or fascinating others.
the property, quality or condition of being magnetic; magnetism.

the act or an instance of touching or pressing with the lips slightly pursed, and then often parting them and emitting a smacking sound, in an expression of affection, love, greeting, reverence, etc.; a kiss.
a light, gentle touch; a slight contact.
to give a kiss to (a person or thing); touch or caress with the lips; to kiss.
touching( gently).
kissed; caressed with the lips.
touched; reached.
that which is kissed.
he who has been kissed.
a woman who has been kissed.
to touch or press with the lips slightly pursed, and then often to part them and to emit a smacking sound, in an expression of affection, love, greeting, reverence, etc.; to kiss.
to touch gently or lightly.
= ಚುಕ್ಕಾಣಿ.
to advance (vehemently to catch, seize, etc.).
to complete; to finish.
to place or put in order.
to fix the price for.
to repay the loan taken from another.
the thing that is lacking or needed; deficiency; a fault; incompleteness.
(a child's term) a train or locomotive; choo-choo.
the sound of a steam locomotive.
the plant Asclepias rosea of Asclepiadaceae family.
= ಚುಕ್ಕಾಣಿ.
lack of tolerance, liberality; the prejudiced, bigoted mind; meanness.
the helm - a) the wheel or tiller by which a ship or boat is steered; b) the complete steering gear, including the wheel or tiller, rudder, etc.
the control or leadership of an organisation, government, etc.; the position of control.
ಚುಕ್ಕಾಣಿ ಹಿಡಿ cukkāṇi hiḍi (fig.) to hold the position of a leader of an organisation, government; to lead.
a person who steers a ship.
(fig.) a leader.
ಚುಕ್ಕಿಯ ಮಾತು cukkiya mātu (fig.) useless or foolish talk.

the planet second in order from the sun, and the most brilliant planet in the solar system, having an equatorial diameter of 7521 miles, a mean distance from the sun of 67.2 million miles, a period of revolution of 224.68 days, and no moons; the Venus.
(myth.) Śukrācārya, the preceptor of demons.
(myth.) any of the demons, disciples of Śukrācārya.
(dance.) a facial gesture, drawing the lips and gently showing the teeth.
the tree Ziziphus glabrata (= Z. trinerva) of Rhamnaceae family; jagged jujube.
the space in which stars (and other heavenly bodies) move; the sky.
to shrink oneself from embarrassment, diffidence, shyness, etc.
to gently pat on the back (of a child) lulling to sleep.
= ಚುಕ್ಕುತಟ್ಟು.
any of the self-luminous celestial objects seen as points of light in the sky, having continuous nuclear reactions which send heat, light, etc. in all directions; a star.
any tiny, round mark (as the one made with a pointed object); a dot.
(fig.) a worthless, useless person.
ಚುಕ್ಕೆಯಾಗು cukkeyāgu to become a target for verbal attack, blame, humiliation, etc.
the tall, coarse weed Rumex vesicarius of Polygonaceae family, with stout taproots and sour leaves; yellow-dock; sorrel.
to treat with disrespect or contemptuously; to talk disdainfully; to slight; to snub.
the deer, Cervus (Axis) axis, of India and Sri Lanka, having a reddish-brown coat spotted with white, and branched, annually shed antlers; spotted deer; chital; axis.
the cat Felis rubiginosa (= Prionailarus rubiginosa) with brown spots, that live in forests; spotted cat.
a repaying off of one's debt fully.
a list of names of persons or bodies that owe money to a loaner, bank or finance institution.
a liquor that has turned sour.
the plant Spondias pinnata (= S. mangifera) of Anacardiaceae family; wild mango tree.
its plum; wild hog plum.
the large, evergreen tree Chukrasia tabularis of Meliaceae family.
its wood.
the plant Oxalis corniculata (= O. pusilla, = Xanthoxalis corniculata) of Oxalidaceae family, with cloverlike compound leaves that contain oxalic acid, found in cool, shaded, damp woods; wood sorrel.
= ಚುಚಲಿ.
the jute plant Corchorus olitorius of Tiliaceae family, which yields a strong, glossy fibre used for making burlap, sacks, mats, rope, etc.
a kind of mouse, that is small in size, with long, pointed snout.
= ಚುಚುಂದರ.
= ಚುಚುಂದರ.
an arrow (with a poison smeared to its point).
the tree Helicteres isora of Sterculiaceae family; east Indian screw pine.
= ಚುಜ್ಜಲು.
that is not regarded or accepted as socially standard.
to cause to pierce, stab or penetrate.
to pass into or through as a pointed instrument does; penetrate; to pierce, stab or penetrate.
to make a hole or holes in.
to speak harshly with a view to inflicting pain into another's mind; to make a caustic or sneering remark.

ಚುಚ್ಚಿಕೊಡು cucci koḍu to give another a malicious, false or defamatory report about (a third person); to create a malicious, spiteful relation between two persons, by slandering; ಚುಚ್ಚಿ ನುಡಿ cucci nuḍi to talk with biting, pungent remarks inflicting pain to another.
to burn or reduce to ashes; to injure, damage or destroy by fire.
to cause to undergo, to inflict, pain; to cause agony.
the act or an instance of piercing or stabbing (with a pointed object).
anything that is small, tiny or little.
a man who, from behind, incites difference of opinion, quarrel or hatred between or among others.
an eatable made by spicing and seasoning young bamboo shoots.
short, prickly hair; bristle-hair.
a kitchen apparatus with a long handle and flattened at the other end, used to mix, overturn, hot stuff being cooked.
the dark brownish or black mark on the skin remaining after a deep wound is healed.
a slandering that besmirches or sullies another's reputation and inflicts great mental pain to that person.
harsh speech or words, sneering remark, etc. intended to cause mental pain.
a sharp, suspicious, angry or sneering look that is uncomfortable to the one being looked at; a looking at with hatred; looking daggers.
a liquid medicine injected into the body; injection.
= ಚುಚ್ಚುನುಡಿ.
a kind of flat cake with a hole at the centre, baked on a frying pan.
the tree Albizzia amara (= A. wightii, = Mimosa amara) of Mimosae family, the powder of the dried leaves of which is mixed with soap-nut powder.
the tree Acacia amara of the same family; oil-cake tree.
the plant Corchorus trilocularis of Tiliaceae family.
= ಚುಜ್ಜಲು.
a poem, passage, talk etc. that is short or shortened.
a kind of poem that is usu. of four lines, witty, sarcastic, etc.
the quality of being swift, vehement or forceful.
the quality characterised by action, motion, energetic work, willing participation, etc.
skill in performing, getting something done, deceiving, etc.; craftiness; skill; trick.
great ability or proficiency; expertness that comes from training, practice, etc.; skill.
the quality of being sharp, keen or pointed; sharpness.
the quality of moving, doing rapidly; swiftness; quick motion.
a sign, mark or symbol.
something that helps to solve a problem, find something, etc.; a clue.
the sharp, short sound made by snapping a finger with the thumb.
a small quantity (of something) that can be held between the thumb and a finger; a pinch.
a kind of tuft for intertwining with the braid.
a series of short stitches.
anything that is small in size or smaller than the normal one.
a branding on the forehead, head with a hot piece of bangle to cure convulsion, paroxysm.
a pair of small, hollowed pieces of wood or ivory held in the hand by a connecting cord clicked together with the fingers to beat time to music; castanets.
the cracking of the finger knuckles making a sharp, short sound or sounds.
to snap a finger and the thumb to produce a sharp, short cracking sound.
to brand with a hot piece of bangle to cure convulsion, paroxysm, etc.
to beat a pair small, hollowed pieces of wood or ivory, holding them between a finger and the thumb to keep time in music.
= ಚುಟಕ.
that which is small in size; a little thing.
a small ball of powdered tobacco prepared for inhaling by sniffing; a snuff-ball.
a more or less cylindrical roll of tobacco cured for smoking, wrapped in a tobacco leaf; a cigar.
a frontal worn on the forehead; a frontlet.
to irritate or provoke with persistent petty distractions, playful fooling, trifling raillery or other annoyance; to annoy; to tease.
calumnious, slanderous; defamatory talk or speech etc.
capable of cutting, piercing with ease; sharp.
flattened rice, made by soaking the paddy in water and pounding, spiced and seasoned.
the annual plant Cicer arietinum of Papilionaceae family; chicken pea plant.
its edible pea; chicken pea.
= ಚುನಿಚುನಿ.
the part of something that faces forward or is regarded as facing forward; most important side; forepart.
beginning - a) a starting or commencing; b) the time of starting.
the part of an army which goes ahead of the main body; vanguard.
the parts of a birḍs jaws that are covered with a horny or leathery sheath; the beak.
the last point, part or extremity of anything; end.
to slip down or away (loosening oneself from another's grip or hold).
to go quietly or secretly; move without attracting notice.
to flash, appear at once and disappear immediately.
to shrink, contract or lose one's vehemence, energy, etc.
a slender, thin, small or subtle thing.
the behaviour that is lacking seriousness; frivolous conduct.
the quality or fact of being shorter than the normal one of the species; shortness.
(dial.) a plant disease that affects sweet potato.
a falling down (from a good position, status, etc.); the fact or state of being ruined.
to go or come to ruin; to be ruined.
to be tired out; to become weary.
the quality of being petty, small-minded, slanderous ; pettiness.
paddy that is soaked and parched; parched rice.
a kind of eatable in the shape of a small ball, made of parched rice.
= ಚುನಮರಿ.
= ಚುನಾವಣೆ.
= ಚುನಾವಣೆ.
selected (for a post, esp. in an organisation or government) by voting; elected.
a man selected (for a post, esp. in an organisation or government) by voting by a large number of persons as their representative; an elected male representative.
a small temporary structure or enclosure or a building used for voting at elections.
a woman selected (for a post, esp. in an organisation or government) by voting by a large number of persons as their representative; an elected female representative.
to choose or select by vote, as for an office or as a representative; to elect.
election - a) the selection of a person or persons for office by vote as a representative or representatives; b) the act of electing.
to be selected by other members or large number of people, as their representative, to an office.
the vine Cardiospermum halicacabum of Sapindacee family.
of inferior quality or character; lacking in dignity or elevation; low; mean.
a harsh, verbal, insulting, criticism.
a remark characterised by sarcasm; a caustic remark.
any flaw, defect, fault or shortcoming.
a worthless, low or mean thing.
a felt or expressed desire for something; a wish.
a narrow-minded, undignified man.

ಚುನ್ನಮಾಡು cunna māḍu = ಚುನ್ನವಾಡು; ಚುನ್ನವಾಡಿಸು cunnavāḍisu to cause to, to incite (someone) to, deride, mock, belittle another; ಚುನ್ನವಾಡು cunnavāḍu to laugh at in or regard with scorn or contempt; to scoff or jeer at; to mock; 2. to abuse, blame, to revile; 3. to make cutting or caustic remark.
to speak, laugh at or treat (someone) scornfully; to ridicule; to lookdown; to disdain.
a man who uses abusive language; he who looks down another or others.
a woman who uses abusive language; she who looks down another or others in contempt.
= ಚುನ್ನಂಗೆಯ್.
a verbal remark that is deriding or sarcastic.
the act or an instance of treating another contemptuously; an insulting or humiliating.
the lower extremity of the face, below the mouth; the projecting part of the lower jaw; the chin.
to draw the fingers gently on the face towards the point of the chin.
(fig.) to treat a person or subject lightly or without due seriousness.
= ಚುಬುಕಿರಿ.
to make crunching sound while eating something; to do such a sound in appreciation of the taste of a thing being eaten.
to make an indistinct, short sound touching the tip of the tongue to the root of upper, front teeth, as appreciation, expressing pity etc.
a lash attached to a stick for urging on animals or punishing etc.
the quality of moving, acting, reacting swiftly; swiftness; quickness; nimbleness; agility.
to scatter (liquid, ashes, powder, etc.) in small drops or particles; to sprinkle.
(a meaningless word used as an adjective to modify) the heat of the rising sun.
a light pain, burning sensation as felt when struck with the palm on the body or caused by a woud, scratch, etc.; smarting sensation.
(a light pain, burning sensation) to be felt (when struck with the palm, stick, whip, etc. on the body).
affected by unhappiness or grief; feeling, showing or accompanied by anguish, sorrowful or mournful; sad.
to inflict with distress, suffering or pain; to cause grief, anguish.
a feeling of contempt for anything regarded as unworthy; haughty contempt; scorn; disdain.
to produce a short, sharp hissing 'chuy' sound (as the hot iron when splashed with water on).
with a short, sharp hissing or 'chuy' sound (as the one made by a hot iron when splashed with water on).
an onomatopoeic word to express the feeling of sudden, sharp, but not lasting, pain burning sensation, etc.
with a gulping, sipping sound; with a sound as the one made by small piece of dried wood, twig, bamboo, etc. while being consumed by fire.
= ಚುರುಮುರಿ.
= ಚುರುಮುರಿ.
an instrument for cutting or stabbing instrument with a sharp metal blade, either single or double-edged, fitted with or hinged into a handle; a knife.
a small well or reservoir.
a scratch made by sharp finger-nail.
= ಚುರುಮುರಿ.
an agile, nimble, quick-responding and brisk man.
a man who is quick, acute or penetrating in perception or intellect; a sharp, cleaver or smart man.
cutting; able to cut or pierce easily and effectively; sharp; keen; acute.
clever, intelligent, smart.
the quality that makes a thing (as the blade of a knife) suitable for use in cutting or piercing; sharpness.
a thing that is biting. piercing or sharp, keen, etc.
the quality of a person who is quick in grasping, thinking or learning; dexterousness; adroitness.
excessive heat of fire or bodily heat.
the ability or quality of being quick; quickness; nimbleness; agility.
dearness in price.
sharp, biting or smarting pain or sensation (caused by a slapping, whipping, poignant or pungent remark, etc.).

ಚುರುಕುಮಾಡು curuku māḍu = ಚುರುಕುಗೊಳಿಸು; ಚುರುಕುಮುಟ್ಟಿಸು curuku muṭṭisu to punish, by beating; 2. (fig.) to cause pain by scolding, condemning sharply; ಚುರುಕು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ curuku meṇasina kāyi the plant Capsicum minimum of Solanaceae family; 2. its small but very hot pod; needle pepper; 3. (fig.) a small boy or girl, small in stature but very sharp, intelligent and active.
to cause to move more rapidly; to make (someone or something) more active; to give impetus, to activate, to hasten; to quicken.
the quality of being quick, agile, nimble; quickness; nimbleness; swiftness.
the quality of being clever, shrewd or smart; shrewdness.
= ಚುರುಚುರಕೆ.
to be heated, burned.
(the mind) to feel psychological pain, distress, agony etc.
(the sun-light) to be hot.
(the mind) to feel psychological pain, distress, agony etc.
(the body system) to feel the sensation or pain of, hunger.
to feel smarting or burning sensation.
= ಚುರುಗುಟ್ಟು.
= ಚುರುಚುರಕೆ.
the common stinging nettle Urtica dioca of Urticaceae family.
the sound made by water while boiling.
a sound imitating it.
the smarting sensation (as felt when a hot thing is touched).
= ಚುರುಗುಟ್ಟು.
a more or less cylindrical roll of tobacco cured for smoking, wrapped in a tobacco leaf; a cigar.
= ಚುರುಮುರಿ.
paddy that is soaked and parched; parched rice.
betel leaf or leaves with pieces of areca nut.
a mixture of brick pieces and lime, of which a water-proof layer is applied on top of the roof of a building.
a kind of eye-disease characterised by redness and inflammation of the eye-balls.
the climbing nettle Tragia involucrata of Euphorbiaceae family.
to pass into or through as a pointed instrument does; penetrate; to pierce, stab or penetrate.
to make a hole or holes in.
to speak harshly with a view to inflicting pain into another's mind; to make a caustic or sneering remark; ಚುರ್ಚಿ ನುಡಿ curci nuḍi to talk with biting, pungent remarks inflicting pain to another.
to burn or reduce to ashes; to injure, damage or destroy by fire.
to cause to undergo, to inflict, pain; to cause agony.
= ಚುರ್ಚುಗೊಳ್ಳಿ.
a piece of burning wood; a firebrand.
a kind of high rising tree.
the palm of the hand, hollowed as to hold some liquid.
= ಚುಲಕ1. 2.a small casket for collyrium.
to treat with disrespect or indifference; to slight.
that much quantity of water which can be held in the hollowed palm.
a little boy or girl.
(fig.) an immature or novice person.
not conforming to what is accepted as standard or decent manner; indecent; mean; unseemly; improper.
the quality of being improper, indecent, unseemly.
a man whose behaviour is characterised by such a quality or qualities.
the eye with continuous discharge of rheum.
a man with such an eye.
a man with narrow mentality; a mean fellow.
a small structure of cement, brick or mud used for cooking food, using firewood or coal as fuel.

= ಚುಲ್ಲಕ2.
roast meat.
the burnt exterior of roast meat.
delicately suggestive; not grossly obvious; subtle.
= ಚುಲಕ1.

beginning - a) a starting or commencing; b) the time of starting.

the parts of a birḍs jaws that are covered with a horny or leathery sheath; the beak.
the last point, part or extremity of anything; end.
a sharp pointed stick carried by travellers; a pike-staff.
a stick used to beat cotton with.

to play in deep water.
the fibrous tissue around the individual segments of a jackfruit.
a slender, thin, small or subtle thing.
the behaviour that is lacking seriousness; frivolous conduct.
the quality or fact of being shorter than the normal one of the species; shortness.
= ಚುಲುಕೋದಕ.
= ಚುಳುಕಾಡು.
= ಚುಲುಕೋದಕ.
causing (sharp) pain; painfully.
the ebony tree Diospyros ebenum (= D. assimilis) of Ebenaceae family; Ceylon ebony.
the tree Cinnamomum zeylanicum of Lauraceae family, bark of which is used as spice; common cinnamon.
a contracting of one's lip into folds or wrinkles; a puckering or pursing.
the plant Barleria mysorensis of Acanthaceae family; Mysore prickly purple dye.
to wry or writhe (one's face).
the common stinging nettle Urtica dioca of Urticaceae family.
cutting; able to cut or pierce easily and effectively; sharp; keen; acute.
clever, intelligent, smart.
the quality that makes a thing (as the blade of a knife) suitable for use in cutting or piercing; sharpness.

a man who walks, runs swiftly.
swiftly; quickly.
to be heated, burnt.
(the mind) to feel psychological pain, distress, agony etc.
an indeclinable used to urge a dog to bark at or fall upon.
a contemptible, despicable or base-spirited man; an abject fellow.
the thing that is lacking or needed; deficiency; a fault; incompleteness.
a dog set on (another dog or person).
(fig.) a person who indiscriminately follows another's orders or acts on another's wish.
a small flat ornament worn as a frontlet at the partition of hair in combing.
a cluster, bunch of flowers, fruits, nuts, etc.
= ಚೂಚುಕ.
the horny bill of a bird; the beak.
the projected part of the face as the snout of a mouse.
that part of an outward-sloping roof of a building, projecting beyond the wall; the roof-ledge.
tapering to a point; pointed.
the small protuberance on a breast or udder through which, in the female, the milk passes in suckling the young; the teat; the nipple.
a very thin small piece of smooth steel etc. pointed at one end and with a slit (eye) for thread at the other, used in sewing by hand or surgical sutures; a needle.
a going away; departure.
a children's game in which one child try to catch others who run hither and thither.
the quality of being swift, vehement or forceful.
the quality characterised by action, motion, energetic work, willing participation, etc.
skill in performing, getting something done, deceiving, etc.; craftiness; skill; trick.
great ability or proficiency; expertness that comes from training, practice, etc.; skill.
the quality of being sharp, keen or pointed; sharpness.
the quality of moving, doing rapidly; swiftness; quick motion.
a sign, mark or symbol.
something that helps to solve a problem, find something, etc.; a clue.
the object to be attained; an intention or purpose; an aim.
a period of suspension of work, study or other activity, usu. used for rest, recreation or travel; recess or holiday; vacation.
cancellation of or release from a debt, tax, penalty, etc.
an active, diligent, clever girl or woman.
to squeeze or compress tightly between the thumb, and a finger (to inflict pain); to nip; to pinch.
to cut, take off by nipping with one's nails.
a contriver - a) he who can plan with ingenuity; b) he who can bring about or effect by a plan, scheme, etc; c) he who plots or plans secretly (a crime, conspiracy, etc.).
a bunch of hairs (on the head).
the natural tuft on the top of the head of a peacock or the comb of a rooster.
the top of anything; summit; ridge.
thick, matted hair.
a small flat ornament worn as a frontlet at the partition of hair in combing.
flattened rice, made by soaking the paddy in water and pounding, spiced and seasoned.

the fragrant grass Cyperus haspan of Cyperaceae family.
open on four sides.
a seat with a square type of canopy standing on railings, open on all the four sides, for the riding on the back of an elephant; an open howdah.
a long piece of resinous wood or twisted tow dipped in tallow, etc., flaming at one end, used as a portable light; a torch.
the piece of wood used for this.
the peak or apex.
a bunch of hairs (on the head).
the natural tuft on the top of the head of a peacock or the comb of a rooster.
a bunch of feathers tied to one's crown, hat, etc.
the upper part of the body in humans, joined to the trunk by the neck; the head.
the top of anything; summit; ridge.
a kind of armlet.

the part of something that faces forward or is regarded as facing forward; most important side; forepart.
beginning - a) a starting or commencing; b) the time of starting.
the part of an army which goes ahead of the main body; vanguard.
the parts of a birḍs jaws that are covered with a horny or leathery sheath; the beak.
the last point, part or extremity of anything; end.
a soldier in the forefront (of an army).

the fight between the vanguards of two rival armies.
a looking from the outer corner of the eyes.
= ಚೂಣಿಗ.
the evergreen tree Mangifera indica of Anacardiaceae family with yellow-red, oblong fruit having juicy pulp, thick rind and a hard stone; mango tree.
a small well or reservoir.
= ಚೂತ.
2.(pros.) a kind of metre with twenty syllables in each line of a poetry.
a young mango leaf or leaves.
the act or power of seeing with the eye; sense of sight; vision.
the organ of sight; the eye.
having a sharp point or edge; suitable for use in cutting; sharp.
a piece of wood or stone that is tapering from a thick back to a thin edge, used as a wedge.
pretentious or conspicuous show; display intended to impress others; ostentation; pomp.
the quality of having or showing skill; artistic ability; artistry; skilfulness; dexterity.
to sharpen by rubbing, grinding or honing.
a narrow, upright, pointed stake used in fences; a picket; a pale.
to urge a dog to bark at or fall upon.
(fig.) to incite a person against another to quarrel with.
to become sharpened, honed.
any dry substance reduced to small particles or dust by crushing, grinding, etc.; powder.
to reduced (a substance) to powder by grinding, crushing, etc; to powder.
an instrument for cutting or stabbing instrument with a sharp metal blade, either single or double-edged, fitted with or hinged into a handle; a knife.

ಚೂರಿಯಿಡು cūriyiḍu = ಚೂರಿಹಾಕು; ಚೂರಿಹಾಕು cūri hāku to stab with a knife; 2. (fig.) to harm (someone) by treachery; ಚೂರಿ ಹದ ಆದರೂ ಮರ ಕಡಿಯಲಾರದು cūri hada ādarū mara kaḍiyalāradu (prov.) however efficient a thing is, it has its own limitations; a pen-knife cannot cut Falkland wood.
the quality of cutting, piercing; sharpness, keenness.
